articles.content:

articles.title: U.S. officials say Soleimani's death could deter Iranian violence
articles.description: U.S. officials said the U.S. drone strike that killed Iranian commander Qassem Soleimani on Friday might deter, rather than provoke, Iranian violence against U.S. targets despite Tehran's vow of retaliation.

articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Trump says ordered killing of Iranian general to prevent war
articles.description: President Donald Trump said on Friday he ordered the killing of Qassem Soleimani to stop a war, not start one, saying the Iranian military commander was planning imminent attacks on Americans.
articles.content:
Posted 
President Donald Trump said on Friday he ordered the killing of Qassem Soleimani to stop a war, not start one, saying the Iranian military commander was planning imminent attacks on Americans.
